title: Game of Thrones Quiz
description: This is a Game of Thrones themed quiz consisting of 20 questions and set to a timer. Wrong answers will decrease the timer. Correct answers will be scored and a percentage will display at the end. Player names and scores are stored for reference and can be called upon by clicking on the scoreboard.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: This is a work day scheduler that displays the current date, takes in information for each hour and remembers that information, and uses color-coding to display past, present, and future.

title: What's for Dinner?
description: Whether you want to dine in or dine out, this application will help you discover new recipes and search for top-rated restaurants in your area.

title: Note Taker
description: This is a simple application for taking notes. It allows the user to create and delete notes.

title: The Office
description: This is an office management program that runs on the command line and allows you to view, add, and delete employees, roles, and departments.

title: Employee Viewer
description: This application takes in data about employees and renders a nicely formatted html page that displays a brief summary about each employee.

title: README Generator
description: This is an application that utilizes node.js to create a professional README file from the command line. When the application is launched it prompts the user for information that will then be formatted and passed along to a newly created README file.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This is a weather dashboard that queries the OpenWeather API to return weather data for the current day and provide a 5-day forecast based on the user's search for a city.

title: Bookish
description: Bookish is a reading list application that allows you to keep a list of which books you have read, and it allows you to add new books that you want to read later.

title: My Job
description: This is a full stack web application that empowers a user to better organize their job search. The user can create a unique profile, add job applications, track their status, update with notes, and compare data.

title: Get Fit
description: This is a fitness and workout tracker that utilizes MongoDB and Mongoose.js to create a database of your workouts.

title: President Shuffle
description: This is a game built using React.js. Everytime time you click on an image the page will scramble their positions and you will need to click on a new image. If you click on the same image twice then it's GAME OVER.

title: Staff Directory
description: This is an employee directory built using React. You can search the directory by name and sort it alphabetically by name.
